transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Haan ji sir, main Nancy baat kar rahi hu sir aapke account manager se. Bas ek call kar rahi hu sir aapka call nahi lag raha tha.
Executive: Nahi idhar range ka thoda problem tha.
Customer: Achcha range ka problem hai. Achcha achcha. Sir main keh rahi thi ek aapne matlab ek call kiya hua tha.
Customer: 23 tarikh ko kiya tha kal Sunday tha. 9696 pe so isiliye.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Mere ko hai na us time kya kuch cheez mangta tha usme se.
Customer: Buy lead credit ka puchna tha aapko kab hota hai aur less kab hota hai aisa.
Executive: Haan haan wo jo apna jo ye jo ye aate hai na buy lead.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo khatam kab hota hai ye puchna tha.
Customer: Isiliye phone kiya tha wo aapka kiya aapka laga nahi.
Customer: Aapne uthaya nahi.
Executive: Haan sir Sunday tha nahi pata chal pata hai na main. Isiliye wo baad me dimag khyal me aaya mere lekin kya ho gaya usse pehle wo liya hi nahi apan ne buy lead wo expired ho gaya na.
Customer: Achcha main batati hu sir kaise use karte hai kya hota hai.
Customer: Sir aapka jo buy lead aata hai wo aapko aa jata hai Sunday ko.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai Sunday to Saturday Saturday ko pehle wala hai Saturday ko khatam karna jaruri hai.
Executive: Haan Saturday ko khatam karna raat ko 12 baje se pehle pehle jaruri hai warna sir expire ho jayega.
Customer: Uske pehle nahi koi chinta nahi wo aaya us din bole mere ko madam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Bole aapke bola aur aapke hai na aaj nahi to kal.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ek madam ka phone aayega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Fir isme specific baatein chalti rahengi.
Customer: Kis cheez ka? Phone.
Executive: Isliye ek alag se ladies humne appoint karne ka soch rahe hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uske upar hi kaam chal raha hai na. Haan wo khatam hone ke baad fir aapko ring karenge abhi kya kuch din baad kya to wahi baat dohra jayega.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai sir to abhi main bata deti hu aapko Saturday ko Saturday se pehle pehle aapko use karna hai Monday ko aati hai Saturday tak khatam karna hai 17 buy lead hoti hai ek week me.
Customer: Theek theek theek theek.
Executive: Aur baki sir production walon ka call aaya tha maine bataya tha aapko ki unse bol dena. Haan unka kaam chalu hai unka kaam chalu hai thoda bacha hua hai wo bacha wo kaam wo jo lady hai na wo karke lengi sab abhi koi chinta nahi hai. Haan description wagera add karwa lena un sare product. Wo karna hai wo karna hai karna hai karna hai karenge. Dusri cheez hai sir aapki concern main close kar rahi hu theek hai fir ye buy lead wala samajh me aa gaya na.
Customer: Ho ho aur hamare idhar kya hota hai baki ladies jo hai na yaha ke pehle wali wo chutti pe rehta hai isiliye aaj isiliye wo uske upar kaam hi nahi hua hai.
Executive: Achcha. To sir aapke pass mera personal number bhi to hai.
Customer: Nahi yahi number hai na.
Executive: Nahi aap maine phone pe save karaya tha sir aapke phone me number aap number save karo mera.
Customer: Ring karo.
Executive: Us us us number se mere ko ring karo ek.
Customer: Chalo theek hai main yaha se concern close kar rahi hu theek hai sir us number se ring karega. Oh chaliye. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about buy lead credit usage and expiry.

- Buy leads expired before customer could use them.



Resolution:

- Explained how to use buy leads before expiry.

- Informed customer about production team's work progress.

- Closed the buy lead concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will save executive's number.

- Customer will call on executive's number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, expiry, production, follow up
